The teams take turns throwing the ball across
the barrier and trying to hit a “ship” (person) on
the other side. Here's the challenge — they
have to throw the ball from their position on
the floor.
HERE WE ARE TO
PRESENT THE HISTORY
OF GERMANY IN A BRIEF
ALL IN A FOR OF A
DOCUMENTARY
a player from a team tries to steal the bacon
kept between them without getting tagged by
the opponent.

name: JAVED ALI
description: Javed Ali is an Indian playback singer who predominantly sings in Hindi. He has also sung in various Indian languages including Bengali, Kannada, Malayalam, Gujarati, Marathi, Odia, Tamil, Telugu and Urdu.

name: NAALAYAK
description: “कलाकार हूँ, मज़दूर नहीं” -sahilsamuel Naalayak is the stage name which is a tag entitled upon Sahil Samuel by his parents and teachers since high school days. Naalayak is an Indie Rock Band from Chandigarh. Formed by Sahil Samuel in 2015 on 21st October.

name: PROGRESSIVE BROTHERS
description: The Progressive Brothers is an Electronic/Dance Duo act consisting of Sunny Sharma and Karan Bhalla. Talk about the Pioneers of Electronic Music scene in India, and it’s nearly impossible that your ears haven’t caught up with name of this EDM-Pop Duo ‘The Progressive Brothers’. They have given world-class performances in almost every corner of the country and specialise in making sure you get off your seat and hit the stage to break a leg ! The Progressive Brothers have shared stage with artists like DJ Snake, Dimitri Vegas Like Mike, David Guetta, Tiesto, Martin Garrix, Kygo, Afrojack, KSHMR, Clean Bandit, Steve Aoki and many more. They have played and rocked every stage they’ve ever been on, be it the top music festivals like Sunburn Festival, VH1 Supersonic, Electric Daisy Carnival, Road to Ultra etc or the top nightclubs in India. They have also collaborated/performed with brands like Adidas Originals, Budweiser, Bacardi, Jägermeister, Absolut and a lot more. Their first pop hit ‘Flipside’ was released on a U.S based label ‘Edm.com’ & the song became an instant hit with over 1.5 million views. The Progressive Brother's previous releases includes, ‘Take My Breath Away’ on Tiesto’s imprint Musical Freedom/Spinnin’ Records, F.U.T.S. on Chuckie’s label, Dirty Dutch Digital. Their Festival anthem song ‘India India’ went viral from stadiums to concerts to clubs & their music is available on all major platforms like Apple music, Spotify & 1000+ digital stores around the globe.

name: THAIKKUDAM BRIDGE
description: Thaikkudam Bridge is a Kerala-based multi-genre music band, founded and formed in 2013 by Govind Vasantha and Siddharth Menon.[1] The band first became famous through the musical show Music Mojo, which used to telecast on Kappa TV and with their own composition "Fish Rock", which became popular through social networking sites and YouTube.

name: ARMAAN MALIK
description: Armaan Malik is a 27-year-old multilingual singer-songwriter with a north of 10 billion streams for more than 300 songs in a dozen different languages and more than 50 million followers across platforms. After cementing his position in the Indian music industry, he has now forayed into the global music circuit with his MTV EMA winning debut English single, ‘Control’, followed by Billboard's Top Triller chart-topping ‘next 2 me’ and ‘How Many’. He is the youngest singer of Indian origin to have performed at The SSE Arena, Wembley, London, and win the SSE Awards Live Act.

name: ANDREA JEREMIAH
description: Andrea Maria Jeremiah is an Indian actress, playback singer, and a musician, who works predominantly in Tamil and Malayalam language films.

name: Fairs of Freedom - For your concern
description:
Elections are the festival of Democracy, being one of the key aspects of the Republic practice. Fifth Pillar brings to you an opportunity to simulate the administrative procedures and make policies. Fairs of Freedom is an event where the participants will get an opportunity to create their own Political Party or you can craft your own nation acting as office bearers of different departments. The parties will have to campaign for themselves and participate in a mock election voted by office bearers of independent nation followed by mock parliament.
Fairs of FREEdom is a FREE event for everyone’s concern!
